synopsis.text:
New Synopsis:

In the sterile confines of an operating room, witness a poignant exploration of life and death through the eyes of a first-year animation student at Tokyo University of the Arts. As the operation unfolds, the suspense builds - will the procedure be successful, or will the patient succumb to their fate? Led by director Xueqing Shao and accompanied by Tatsuki Tsushima's evocative music and Hiraku Someno's skillful sound design, this 2015 anime invites you to contemplate the delicate balance between life and death. Produced by Koji Yamamura, this thought-provoking work promises to leave a lasting impression.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
